Package webemex.eshop.service

Class UsersManagementService

java.lang.Object
webemex.eshop.service.UsersManagementService
@Service public class UsersManagementService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing user-related operations, such as registration, login, authentication, token management, and user information.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public AuthorizationDTO register(AuthorizationDTO registrationRequest)
      Registers a new user and encodes the password.
      Parameters:
      registrationRequest - The request data for user registration.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` containing user information and status messages.

    • login

      public AuthorizationDTO login(AuthorizationDTO loginRequest)
      Authenticates a user and generates JWT tokens.
      Parameters:
      loginRequest - The login request data with username and password.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with JWT tokens and status messages.

    • refreshToken

      public AuthorizationDTO refreshToken(AuthorizationDTO refreshTokenRequest)
      Refreshes a JWT token.
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenRequest - The request containing the refresh token.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with the new JWT and status messages.

    • getAllUsers

      public AuthorizationDTO getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the repository.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with a list of users and status messages.

    • getUsersById

      public AuthorizationDTO getUsersById(UUID userId)
      Retrieves user information by a unique UUID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The UUID of the user.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with user details or status messages.

    • deleteUser

      public AuthorizationDTO deleteUser(UUID userId)
      Deletes a user by their UUID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The UUID of the user to delete.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with status and messages about the deletion.

    • updateUser

      public AuthorizationDTO updateUser(UUID userId, AppUser updatedUser)
      Updates a user with new information.
      Parameters:
      userId - The UUID of the user to update.
      updatedUser - The updated user information.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` indicating the success or failure of the update.

    • getMyInfo

      public AuthorizationDTO getMyInfo(String username)
      Retrieves the information of the currently authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the authenticated user.
      Returns:
      An `AuthorizationDTO` with user information.

    • getAuthenticatedUser

      public AppUser getAuthenticatedUser()
      Retrieves the authenticated user from the security context.
      Returns:
      An `AppUser` object with the authenticated user's information.
